price: 假若你的养主意欲，他必使众人变成为一个民族。他们将继续分歧，
arabic: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walaw shāa rabbuka lajaʿala al-nāsa ummatan wāḥidatan walā yazālūna mukh'talifīna
